Articles.Content:
When playing Career Mode with the Agressive Negiotiations strategy enabled, craft will recover for more money than they cost to launch.

Steps to replicate:

Start new Career, activate "Agressive Negotiations" strategy with the reputation available.

Build a random craft. Check the cost indicator in the lower left corner of VAB.

Launch. Do *not* touch the throttle or stage anything, just let it sit.

Recover craft. Craft will recover for full value even though it is launched for less than full value. Profit.

This can be repeated as many times as desired to farm infinite cash.

Issue is probably part of game mechanics and therefore present on all systems.
I have notices this, but I guess I just choose not to farm lol
